about_the_game:
Jazzhands is a gesture controlled, action-based rhythm game. Restore harmony to a silenced galaxy as you refine your choreography through increasingly challenging levels. Destroy beats by channelling the power of your bare hands through only the eye of your webcam.

  • Free demo featuring 3 distinct levels allowing you try before you buy!

Jazzhands uses computer vision to interpret your gestures requiring only a webcam, avoiding the requirement of specialist VR hardware. This facilitates a unique mixed-reality experience that aims to remain accessible to most gamers. Jazzhands has been further optimized to work with a broad spectrum of devices, including those with less processing capabilities.

  • All you need to get started is a basic webcam or an integrated camera.

  • There's no need for specialised VR or MR technology, or a high-end gaming device.

  • Offline, local and private - we don't store any footage, everything is live-time.

In a galaxy once thriving with song, the mysterious Silent Composer has repressed all rhythm. Travel through 6 muted worlds meeting inhabitants and restoring missing melodies in a mission to extinguish the Composer's dark presence, and release his rhythmic grip. In this demo you will travel across 3 planets, performing to each one!

  • Distinctive worlds, each hosting a range of unique characters and lore.

  • Uncover the galaxy's secrets as you embark on an epic tour!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (4 Cores)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics
  • Additional Notes: Requires a webcam/integrated camera.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz (6 Cores)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 (6GB)
  • Additional Notes: Requires a webcam/integrated camera.
